Valid for select 2026 sailings Description Set sail on an unforgettable journey along Colombia’s legendary Magdalena River, where culture, history, and natural beauty converge. Step into the vibrant streets of Palenque, the first free city in Colombia, and feel the pulse of cumbia and vallenato—iconic rhythms that echo the nation’s soul. Wander through Cartagena’s colorful Getsemaní neighborhood, where bold murals, local cafés, and family-run shops tell stories at every turn. Along the way, discover how Spanish and pre-Colombian traditions have shaped the country’s rich cultural tapestry. From captivating destinations to heartfelt local encounters, let this extraordinary river cruise immerse you in the spirit of Colombia—and the warmth of its people.
